title: 10th June 1916: Arab Revolt begins when Sharif Hussein bin Ali orders his troops to attack the Ottoman Caliphate’s garrison in the holy city of Mecca
itunes:summary: The British supported the Revolt as it distracted tens of thousands of Ottoman troops from joining other fronts in the First World ...
